summary:
This 2003 adventure film, directed by Gore Verbinski, is based on the popular Disney theme park ride. It stars Johnny Depp as the mischievous pirate Jack Sparrow. When the love interest, Elizabeth (Keira Knightley), is kidnapped, Jack teams up with a blacksmith (Orlando Bloom) to rescue her. They face off against cursed pirates led by Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush).

The movie was a surprise hit, making over $650 million worldwide. Depp's performance as Jack Sparrow earned him many accolades. The film's success led to four sequels.
title: Pirates of the Caribbean The Curse of the Black Pearl
